issue.title: [JAVA] Reduce Heap Usage (Phase 3): consolidate buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1807](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1807). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Consolidate buffers for reducing the volume of objects and heap usage

<validity + data> => single buffer for fixed width
< validity + offsets> = single buffer for var width, list vector
